question: Which ministry conferred with Swachh Bharat Inter-Ministerial Award?
explanation: Ministry of Petroleum & Natural Gas (MoPNG) was awarded Swachh Bharat Inter-Ministerial Award in Swachh Bharat National Award ceremony on Gandhi Jayanti, in New Delhi. The Swachh Bharat Inter-Ministerial Award was given by Minister of State, Ministry of Drinking Water & Sanitation S.S.Ahluwalia to MoPNG. The award was received by Senior Adviser (PNG). The focus of MoPNG has been not only to improve peoples' involvement but also to bring behavioral change through Swachh Bharat Mission.
